Package io.nflow.metrics

Class NflowMetricsContext

java.lang.Object
io.nflow.metrics.NflowMetricsContext
@Named("nflowMetrics/metricsContext") @Configuration public class NflowMetricsContext extends Object
Configures MetricsWorkflowExecutorListener.
